code: var scores=[{_id:1,point:0},{_id:2,point:0},{_id:3,point:0},{_id:4,point:0},{_id:5,point:0},{_id:6,point:0},{_id:7,point:0},{_id:8,point:0},{_id:9,point:0},{_id:10,point:0}];export function saveScore(id,selectedOption,answer){var scoreInDb=scores.find(function(x){return x._id===id;});if(parseInt(selectedOption)===parseInt(answer.oId)){scoreInDb.point=1;}else if(selectedOption!==answer.oId){scoreInDb.point=0;}return scoreInDb.point;}var sc=[1,2,3];export function getScore(score){sc.push("8");return sc.length;}export function getSc(){var len=sc.length;return len;}
